review_text: Good. The course was good. I have a lot of new and fresh ideas on how to apply smart thinking to my own blog and how to get good ranking on Google. I would have liked a bit more hands on, dirty work though. There was a lot of talk on how different services do different things, which is helpful, but I would have found it more interesting if we could have been given universal knowledge. Overall, great course for the right price.
Very useful information taught in a very useful way.
There were several instances where the video just wouldnâ€™t play. It could be my phone/internet connection speed. Other than that, the course was outstanding!!!
Amazing Course. Learned a lot from this course. Highly Recommended.

If you are on the fence about this course, jump on over.  I had all the skills necessary to do a blog content strategy but I didn't know how to structure my research to successfully execute the strategy.  This course is a blueprint to making any blog have better reach and return.
Amazing course! Clear, valuable, and full of tools. I recommend it 100%
Wonderful series which explains ins and outs of Blogging. Fantastic!!

Overall a great opportunity to learn more about SEO industry and especially content promotion strategy. I have found one wrong question options that has been said that "alt" as an HTML tag although it is an attribute of  tag.

A very comprehensive overview of developing a blog content strategy. The number of online tools that were briefly shown as a bit much to keep track of. It would have been nice to have some downloads with summaries.

The course was so interesting, it opened my eye with so many interesting tools and strategies i dont know about before but i have a question for the author regarding SEO yoast, my question is how do we make image to have ALT attributes
Very basic stuff, but useful for beginners. Best of luck!

I thoroughly enjoyed the course. Although I ended up taking it over a longer period of time that I had anticipated, it was well organized and allowed me to stay on top of my progress all the way through. I am looking forward to working new gigs of blog content strategy!

As a newbie to the trade (50 gigs on Fiverr), I found this course to be very insightful.  A bit overwhelming, but I'm not complaining.  I just took a lot of notes and screenshots so I could come back to it for a refresher.  I also Ian's other course on blogging.
Great Course. Thanks Ian!
Great information! Course discusses a number of free SEO tools and other services that are helpful for optimization and analytics.
Although I had more expectations, I wanted more hands on and examples. But he looks like he knows what he is doing.
Very informative and practical, I got a lot out of this!
I totally recommend it :)
Excellent ideas and straight-forward implementation plans
Best course ever!
Gave me a lot of awesome on free tools! Also helped me create a good work flow and process! I'm so glad I went through the course

The course absolutely rocks and comes with templates. The speaker accent is Irish and may need subtitles...but to use as a point is not really because the blog strategy has an international side of the river/ocean explanation on blog strategy. Awesome!
So much useful information on how we can improve strategy for our clients!
Course is for beginners. Should be another course for high level.
Goes really in depth and gives you everything you need to be successful
Good course for beginners but I was expecting a little more strategies and techniques to create blog content strategy for clients. Thank you.
Really useful and interesting course. It's definitely something that I can see myself referring back to in the future.
Great course learned a lot!
Awesome information, brilliant downloads to start implementing what you learn straight away. Because I always knew a lot of the content, this was a fab refresher and would recommend to newbies too.

I thought the course was well organized and clearly articulated, however, I didn't really feel it offered me anything groundbreaking. I felt I had come across most of it before and thought there were areas that could have been explained in more detail. This course will not have you ready to take on clients - period. You'll need to research in detail all of the points presented if you are serious about offering your "Blog Content Strategy". This wasn't a bad course, but it wasn't for me and I've been left with buyer's remorse. It may be different for you.
really enjoyed it thank you!
Great course learned a lot. It goes really in depth and gives you everything you need to be successful thank you!
Great course, to be honest, I got what I expected! Valuable information! Thank you

Having purchased the Website Blog and SEO Course, it taught me so many things. Highly recommend it to anyone learning about Blog and SEO. Very informative and helped me enormously towards developing Websites for my Fiverr clients and Ranking my Fiverr clients websites high and top on Google.
Very well organized course. I have learnt a lot about content marketing, building a content and convert visitors into customers.
Well detailed and really helpful. Thanks a bunch.
An excellent guide to implementing a content strategy from the ground up. Easy to follow and very informative with lots of resources provided.
Very good intermediate course on how to create an awesome blog content strategy! Ian shows us exactly which tools to use, and how to use them to drastically optimize our game plans. Thanks a bunch!

This course is exceptional. Ivan has created a fantastic course that, even though being concise, covers all the key aspects of building a Blog Content Strategy. This is the best course I have ever purchased and it is definitely worth the money. I wish Ivan immense success and hope that many other fellow bloggers and freelancers like me get the opportunity to learn from him.
This course is superbly laid out, with great information. Highly recommend it to those starting on the journey of Blog Content Strategy!
Great blogging strategies and the course offers a lot of resources in terms of analytics and optimization of your blog.
Excellent information. Even an experienced content strategist and blogger can pick up a few tricks from this material!
Very precise and valuable course. I will be implementing this for my client's inside and outside of Fiverr. Definitely worth it!
I enjoyed the course and learned allot thanks.
Awesome! Really informative and helpful!

This is such an informative course that breaks down big topics into small chunks that makes them so much easier to grasp.

I've learnt some great skills and recommend this course to everyone.
Complete and easy to follow

It was a GREAT course and I took many, many notes!! It definitely expanded what I can offer to my present clients and future clients which has increased my value.

Thank you very much!!

Sarah Cole - Social Media
Real Estate Marketing Strategist
The course content was professional but the sound quality can be further improved.

Simply outstanding. If you are a beginner blogger or advance one, this course is worth taking the shot. Value packed, to the point, informative, thorough and practical. I was doubtful before enrolling that duration is too short but this 2 hours equals 10 hours of any other course !!

I am not particularly computer or web-savvy, so much of this info was over my head.  And there was a lot of info.  But probably a great course for someone with more basic knowledge of the web, and social media, than me.  Thanks.

I found the course very informative and practical. only content promotion area I think a bit complicated for beginners. I learn a lot of practical knowledge and hopefully going to apply on my own blog as well as on Fiverr. Thanks, Ian cleary
Very comprehensive and educative
Great course, packed with easy to understand tips, resources and a step by step approach to covering everything one needs to know to create a blog content strategy
Really a valuable and great course. Instructor has covered the topics in-depth and have shared many tools, which makes SEO process very easy.

This course takes the rather unsexy topics of SEO and blog optimisation and turns them into manageable chunks that are easy to implement. He does cover a lot of material, often speaks fast, and uses the industry lingo but the quality and practicality of the content is great.
Excellent course, very informative, engaging, easy to follow and learn, I enjoyed every moment of this course, and am ready to blog and build blogs!
Wow!  This course went way beyond expectations of just Blog Content Strategy!  It's definitely an advanced course that I highly recommend experienced bloggers take!
Very useful, I really appreciated that it covered both high-level concepts as well as executional, including recommendations for free and paid tools.

This is a very good course for those new to blogging and willing to understand the underlying dynamics and how to optimize the results from a blog. Definitely worthwhile! I did have to pause every now and then and go back to review because the pace is quite fast and there are also some assignments to do in between the chapters. Great value!
Very informative.  Thank you.
great love it !!!

Quite technical and comprehensive. So many softwares unveiled and necessary to research and review. Summarily the course was quite interesting. Who would have thought there would be so much technicalities to it!
Very insightful.  I learned a lot!
Long and detailed course. Extremely put together for someone new to blogging or a novice! Highly recommend!
It could be improve my adding some free SEO tools for use
the instructor knows his onions. Definitely worth every minute I spent watching.
Good course but need some more detailed course in seo field. thanks
I enjoyed this course and the resources that were shared will really help me with creating content that will be found.

Absolutely brilliant. This was alot more than just a blog strategy course. It has helped both my social influence skills and fiverr gig offerings. I really enjoyed the detail each course went through with lots of useful information for building your freelancing services. I will be referring to the course material while I close my first sale. 5 stars.  #cannabispromoter #fiverr #indoerswetrust
Good, informative and fun.
One of my favorites. Very happy with the way the presenter explained everything. Probably the best SEO course on fiverr learn.
A really useful course, not fully what I was expecting. but it was well delivered, comprehensive and structured.
Superb tactics....Thank You!
Very informative course!
Good enough. But not as per my exceptions.
It was very valuable and exceptional!
A very amazing and creative course to master! I highly would recommend to new buyers!
A very amazing and creative course to master! I highly would recommend to new buyers!
Really fun course!

Really well-done! I learned so much in such a short amount of time. I highly recommend this course for those offering services in blog writing, social media planning, and more! Definitely a versatile course.
This is worth way more than what it costs! Thank you so much for the insightful course!
Graet course! thank you for this effort :)

Great level of detail, and resources throughout this course! I will definitely be implementing these tools and processes for my own blog and hopefully some clients in the future! He focused on FREE TOOLS, which I definitely prefer, but also goes into detail about how you may be able to gain even more benefit from specific paid tools if you can afford the investment. I do wish the course provided some direct reference sources for some of that stats that were provided.
It was a really useful course. You will find many special tactics to evolve your service/business.
Really good content!
One of the most robust courses I've ever taken!

The Blog Content Strategy course provides specific tips and techniques to improve your overall content and strategy. Thank you for putting together such a useful and interesting course! I was especially thankful for the resources that come included, as well as the long list of free online tools I have added to my bookmarks tab as a result of the course. 6/5, I highly recommend! ðŸ˜Š

Very enjoyable and comprehensive course on content marketing. It does not only contain a high level view on blog content strategy, but it also goes into the details of executing each and every steps of the process and all necessary the tools involved.
Ian Cleary offers valuable information in this course. There's zero fluff. Every second is worth your time.

Wow!

A detailed and informative course that is easy to understand. I've learnt some great stuff to up my game and I recommend this course to everyone.

Thank you.

Best course available to learn about creating an ultimate content strategy that will make your client happy. I've learned a lot from keyword research to influencers research, this course has covered everything related to blog content strategy.

I am so far 49% of the way through the course and it is full of information and the teacher talks very clearly. The content is very interesting and therefore, easily retained. The recourses so far are fantastic, I am really enjoying this course so far! Can't wait to get my badge!
The Best Course! I loved it!
Great course. I've taken a lot of online courses, this one is very well presented, paced well, has great information etc.
I highly recommend this course, it's easy to understand and practical.
Fantastic course! Thanks, Ian.  It was a very thorough course with many actionable steps that right out of a successful blog content strategist's playbook.
Loved the course. It covers every aspect of content strategy.
Very clear, interesting and enjoyable to watch - thanks!
This guy is awesome, and he has a great Irish accent.

I absolutely loved this course and feel like I've gained so much valuable information, both to help my clients as a freelance writer and to use in developing my own blog strategy! Really well organised and set out and super easy to follow. Oh, and amazing value considering the abundance of information and tools you will discover - well worth the small investment! Thanks so much!

Very informative course.  Everything is broken down into simple, easy to understand and implement elements, and you're even provided with templates to use and download for your work.

Great value for money.  I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to learn more about Blog Content Strategies, as a freelance writer, or for writing your own blog content.  It covers topics from defining your target audience, to how to select/find topics and keywords, generate content and build your outreach and promotion strategies.

Thank you for Ian, for a brilliant course!
A nice, compact course with all of the relevant free and paid-for tools mentioned and many demonstrated. Helpful templates included.
Beautiful and very interesting course
Learned more then I was expecting! vert easy to understand and very effective. Thank you!

It is a very useful course it gave some of the tolls that I even imagine that the ware out there. I'm very happy with what I have learned in this course. 
Thank you very much Fiverr

This course provided much needed information in a concise and understandable manner. Each lesson was short enough to retain information and the quizzes helped in remembering content.  The documents provided will be utilized efficiently for future clients.
10/10 recommend this course!!

The course was very informative. I like that it touched on a lot of different aspects and topics which I will have to spend more time researching myself. The whole course gave me an overview of the things I have to be aware of when creating a website, how to analyze different strategies so that you can then optimize them.
Really great Course for the most important Basics!
Clear and easy to understand modules. Lots of great tips and helpful tools included. This will be helpful in my blog writing and editing work right away!
great course. Learned a lot. Thank you

I bought the course months ago .But i wasn't confident enough to learn and implement it . Although I  have only two projects won, this course has open doors to new skills and gigs for me .
Thank you  very much
Regards Gulrukh

Great course! I wouldn't recommend it for beginners, as the content is pretty advanced. I give it four stars because some of the quiz answers were wrong, and it made it kind of confusing. Ian is great!
Awsome!
okay, too many information to digest, but ok.
A must course for every beginner blogger.
Great content!
All fired up from start to finish! Thank you, Ian!
Engaging, useful and learned a lot of things that will help a lot in blog marketing
This course was amazing. Easy to follow along and plenty of bullet points for note-taking.
Great content, very useful resources, powerful visualizations, good delivery.

This was a very detailed and well-structured course. Since it is such a broad topic, it doesn't go in-depth on every area, but still provides enough information to understand the material well. Whether you are working on your blog or for a client, whether you are a beginner or an experienced blogger - you will get something out of this course for sure!
this is good for everyone.

Fantastic!!!  The course has high quality downloads, covers in depth and clearly what's needed to provide blog and site analysis and improvement using free tools and a few paid tools as needed depending on the budget. I feel like I've gone from working in a vacuum never sure which angle to take to - well, competent!! And confident.
Very well explained each section of "blog content strategy".
There was a lot of practical experience to be gained and I loved that! It also had properly displayed content that are important for learning the art of creating a blog content strategy.
good presentation

Having the tools and downloads give some structure to the process and that is helpful. The course is broken into sections, making it easy to pause and absorb information before going to the next section.

Gives comprehensive overview, then dives deep into resources and principles. Includes quizzes so that the material sticks.

Highly recommended!
The course is concise. The mentor has explained everything clearly. However, it would have been better if it had more detail.
It is beneficial for those who want to create content or for someone who has a blog that wants to build their blog. I learned a lot about how to be better and more things than I didn't even realize.
It's both technical and practical. Helpful!
Very detailed for a beginner
Helpful information.
Very thorough and detailed with some nice review sections.
It's good but needs to upgrade its cause, it's almost outdated. Thanks
Very informative and insightful
This is an amazing course for starting a blog and doing better day by day with it and make a living. Thank you so much for sharing the course with us.
So much valuable information!

Overall the course was good. I know I could not have expected the world to only pay under $40 for the course. The course goes over the strategic part of setting up a blog. What I wish they did was create a section to go over the structure of the blog when you write it. They did give us some tips, but it was very broad, Overall if you are looking to learn about the distribution and making sure that your blog ranks and brings traffic, this is the course for you.
Great!
Great skillset with amazing execution. Thanks for the quality delivery. Highly recommended to everyone.

I was very lucky to find this course on Fiverr's marketplace. I enjoyed learning new tactics about building an effective blog strategy and I am going to implement it. The course is very juicy and contains  a lot of valuable lessons and guidelines. Thank you!

Incredible course! This course is very professional, and it took everything I knew to the next level. Now that I have completed it, I feel competent and confident enough to launch a new gig here on Fiverr.

It is by far the most comprehensive and valuable course I have purchased. I recommend it to anyone who wants to get better at writing! The course is packed full of practical skills and covers almost everything. In addition, the quiz questions are more challenging than the other course. I'd give it a 6 star if I could!

This course is very helpful for beginners. 

however, I thought there will be new techniques but it same which I am already doing, however, his course helped me to increase my 10% more knowledge!

This course offered great information that will help no matter where in the process I work. Although I may not be consulting with clients to provide a good Blog Content Strategy, it helps to know how it is done.
Very knowledgeable course. I must recommend it to everyone who is into job of SEO. Each and very step is explained in brief manner.
Great Content, really helpful :)
Great course, very insightful and easy to understand
Nicely explained in details about the blog strategies and importance of SEO
It is a great way to validate our knowledge and optimize our SOPs.
Very helpful and informative course. I do highly recommend it!

Well informative.
But... Extremely needed to update and upgrade informations on every new years for more effective. Cause after this course published strategy has been changed so much.

A lot of useful info to take in, but it is a lot of listening and watching, wish there was just a bit more hands on experience as it were. But useful as to the in's and out's of blog writing and best way to get blogs optimised and seen, and ultimately read by the public.
Very insightful and interesting style of teaching
Wonderfully explained and easily understandable. The resources provided are informative and valuable.
Excellent Course.
Great course! Perfect for businesses wanting to run a successful blog, or for writers who want in-depth information to help their clients with their blogs.
Great course. learned lot of new things. Thanks.

The tutor's style was warm and engaging, and they provided much information. The information itself was useful, actionable, and contained great extra nuggets, like walk-throughs of useful software related to the topic.
Awesome teaching style with a relaxed, easy-to-follow flow. I love it!
Great course with useful tips. It delivers a lot in such short format.
A truly enlightening course. Although I was knowledgeable before, there were still many subjects that I was enlightened about. Thanks.
The course was very knowledgeable.
Excellent Course

I took this course as a small business owner wanting to know more about strategizing my blog to grow engagement and sharing in the future. While there was some valuable information in this course about that, it leaned heavily on paid tools, which would not be in my budget or just not available to me because of  my website platform. I wish there was more information on especially how to research keywords for free, and tools not specific to WordPress.
Great course, with lots of useful information. Duration is perfect as it covers various topics effectively. Learned about great tools I hadn't heard about.
Great course. I highly recommend it.
The content was good, but the videos would randomly pause and the instructor did not have good eye contact with the camera.
Very good course. Well presented, accessible and broken up into nice chunks. Provides a really good introduction to many key areas. The instructor has a very nice pace and encouraging tone :)
Worth purchasing!
Great course thank you!
This course is really healpful.
Extensive. Even though I've been writing content for many years, I learned things I'd not come across before.
like it

I found what I was searching, for to do content marketing strategy. The instructor is highly professional and his teaching is superb. I recommend this course for all, especially for SEO specialists.
informative
